message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a fantastic deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our prices, but I'm not sure I can go any higher.

Bob, I understand your position, but $12,500 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $13,500. This is a fair compromise, and it still represents a great value for you. Let's make this deal happen.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $13,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $13,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product.
